name: ESPN Sports Connection
description: Developed from the ground up to fully leverage the Wii U, ESPN Sports Connection lets you play the most popular sports from a new perspective. Play solo, team up in co-op to experience new gameplay possibilities, or compete head-to-head in multiplayer! Play six of the most popular sports: Soccer, football, baseball, tennis, golf, and karting. Customize your avatars with ESPN gear: Progress through more than 40 achievements and unlock original ESPN outfits and create your own designs. Touch controls: Use the Wii U GamePad in football to call a blitz to sack the quarterback or in soccer curve a penalty kick and score! Get inside the action: Use the Wii U GamePad as a window into your environments. Scan in 360 degrees to analyze the golf course and prepare for your next swing. Play with the Wii Remote Plus using real sports gestures: Swing with precision in golf or hit a home run in baseball. Game on both your TV and Wii U GamePad: Drive your kart to victory competing with up to five players (four split screens on your TV + the Wii U GamePad), or play solo switching anytime between the Wii U GamePad and TV! Play fun mini-games: Try the tennis Cannon Ball Challenge with friends and test your reflexes!
